column4: Is there the possibility to get multiple tabs on my terminal window?. Similar to what i can do in mozilla firefox or internet explore.

<chris_wilkinson> another question. Im running Xchat in a graphical mode. I think this consumes more bandwith that if I would run it with commands. Do you know if there exist a XCHAT version with commands?
why should xchat use more bandwidth than a cli-irc-client?
